headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. (ARE): A Bear Case Theory
summary: We came across a bearish thesis on Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. on Compounding Dividends’s Substack by TJ Terwilliger. In this article, we will summarize the bears’ thesis on ARE. Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc.’s share was trading at $54.64 as of January 13th. ARE’s trailing and forward P/E were 150.89 and 16.69 respectively according to Yahoo […]

headline: 3 Former Stock Picks Where Technical Indicators Say Buy
summary: Burlington Stores, Ituran Location and Control, and Bristol Myers Squibb have gained since being chosen, and their charts look strong.

headline: 3 Value Stocks That Fall Short
summary: The low valuation multiples for value stocks provide a margin of safety that growth stocks rarely offer. However, the challenge lies in determining whether these cheap assets are genuinely undervalued or simply on sale due to their potentially deteriorating business models.
